name: Sister Wish
description: Sister Wish - this is classic mahjong solitaire game. Mahjong is a tile-based game, just select pair of 2 similar tiles and clean the table, thats all needed for win. Hey, brother welcome to the "Sister Wish". To be step brother of 8 sisters, you should try to be more kind, courteous, polite. Yeah, thats really hard, I know, what about I told. But in our little city, all differently, from relations to something more than just friends. In this game you can get to know with Alisa, Emmy, Bruna, Mellisa, Stasy, Viky, Judy, Kate. This is 8 sisters have strong relations and your main task to make friends relation with all sisters. Just play mahjong and make it with step sisters. Use your wits, mind.
